TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit ValueType extends System.Object

span.span: Provides the base class for value types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写虚拟方法从与更合适的值类型实现。 overrides the virtual methods from with more appropriate implementations for value types. 另请参阅，后者又继承。See also , which inherits from . 数据类型分为值类型和引用类型。Data types are separated into value types and reference types. 值类型是堆栈分配，或者在结构中的以内联方式分配。Value types are either stack-allocated or allocated inline in a structure. 引用类型是堆分配。Reference types are heap-allocated. 引用和值类型都派生自的最终基类。Both reference and value types are derived from the ultimate base class . 在的行为就像一个对象的值类型所需的情况下，一个包装这样看起来像在堆上分配引用对象和值类型的值复制到它的值类型。In cases where it is necessary for a value type to behave like an object, a wrapper that makes the value type look like a reference object is allocated on the heap, and the value type's value is copied into it. 这样系统就会知道它包含值类型标记包装。The wrapper is marked so the system knows that it contains a value type. 此过程称为装箱，和反向过程被称为取消装箱。This process is known as boxing, and the reverse process is known as unboxing. 装箱和取消装箱允许使用任何类型被视为一个对象。Boxing and unboxing allow any type to be treated as an object. 尽管是隐式基类对于值类型，不能创建继承的类直接。Although is the implicit base class for value types, you cannot create a class that inherits from directly. 相反，各个编译器提供语言关键字或构造 (如`struct`C# 中和`Structure`...`End Structure`Instead, individual compilers provide a language keyword or construct (such as `struct` in C# and `Structure`…`End Structure` 在 Visual Basic)，支持值类型的创建。in Visual Basic) to support the creation of value types. 除了作为.NET Framework 中的值类型的基类直接在代码中通常不使用结构。Aside from serving as the base class for value types in the .NET Framework, the structure is generally not used directly in code. 但是，它可作为方法调用中的参数来限制对值类型，而不是所有对象的可能的参数或允许一个方法来处理多个不同的值类型。However, it can be used as a parameter in method calls to restrict possible arguments to value types instead of all objects, or to permit a method to handle a number of different value types. 下面的示例演示如何阻止将引用类型传递到方法。The following example illustrates how prevents reference types from being passed to methods. 它定义一个名为`Utility`，其中包含四个方法： `IsNumeric`，指示其自变量是否是一个数字;`IsInteger`，指示其自变量是否是一个整数;`IsFloat`，指示其自变量是否是一个浮点数; 和`Compare`，指示两个数值之间的关系。It defines a class named `Utility` that contains four methods: `IsNumeric`, which indicates whether its argument is a number; `IsInteger`, which indicates whether its argument is an integer; `IsFloat`, which indicates whether its argument is a floating-point number; and `Compare`, which indicates the relationship between two numeric values. 每种情况下，在方法参数属于类型，并且阻止引用类型传递给方法。In each case, the method parameters are of type , and reference types are prevented from being passed to the methods. [!code-csharp[System.ValueType.Structure#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.valuetype.structure/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ValueType.Structure#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.valuetype.structure/vb/example1.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示如何调用的方法`Utility`类。The following example illustrates calls to the methods of the `Utility` class. [!code-csharp[System.ValueType.Structure#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.valuetype.structure/cs/example1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.ValueType.Structure#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.valuetype.structure/vb/example1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Equals(object obj) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Equals (obj As Object) As Boolean

param.name: obj
param.span: 要与当前实例进行比较的对象。

span.span: The object to compare with the current instance.

summary.span: 指示此实例与指定对象是否相等。

span.span: Indicates whether this instance and a specified object are equal.

returns.span: 如果 和该实例具有相同的类型并表示相同的值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if and this instance are the same type and represent the same value; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法重写和.NET Framework 中的所有值类型都提供的值相等性的默认实现。The method overrides and provides the default implementation of value equality for all value types in the .NET Framework. 如果没有当前实例的字段和`obj`是引用类型，方法执行逐字节比较的两个对象在内存中。If none of the fields of the current instance and `obj` are reference types, the method performs a byte-by-byte comparison of the two objects in memory. 否则，它使用反射要比较的相应字段`obj`和此实例。Otherwise, it uses reflection to compare the corresponding fields of `obj` and this instance. > [!TIP] > 尤其是值类型包含所引用类型的字段，则应重写方法。Particularly if your value type contains fields that are reference types, you should override the method. 这可以提高性能并使您能够更好地表示的类型的相等性的含义。This can improve performance and enable you to more closely represent the meaning of equality for the type. ## 说明 [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]Notes for the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] 当您调用方法[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]结构，它不会覆盖的值类型提供的默认行为。When you call the method on a [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] structure, it provides the default behavior for value types that don't override . 这是.NET Framework 提供了有关支持的一部分[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)](请参阅[.NET Framework 支持的 Windows 应用商店应用程序和 Windows 运行时](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/support-for-windows-store-apps-and-windows-runtime.md))。This is part of the support that the .NET Framework provides for the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] (see [.NET Framework Support for Windows Store Apps and Windows Runtime](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/support-for-windows-store-apps-and-windows-runtime.md)). [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] 结构不能重写，即使它们编写与C#或 Visual Basic 中，因为它们不能包含方法。structures can't override , even if they're written with C# or Visual Basic, because they can't have methods. (此外，结构中[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]本身不继承。)但是，它们显示为具有， ，和方法在 C# 或 Visual Basic 代码中，使用它们以及.NET Framework 提供的默认行为，这些方法时。(In addition, structures in the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] itself don't inherit .) However, they appear to have , , and methods when you use them in your C# or Visual Basic code, and the .NET Framework provides the default behavior for these methods. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将派生的值的类型可以重写方法。The following example demonstrates how the method can be overridden by a derived value type. [!code-cpp[ValueType.Equals Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ValueType.Equals Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ValueType.Equals Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ValueType.Equals Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ValueType.Equals Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ValueType.Equals Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetHashCode () As Integer

summary.span: 返回此实例的哈希代码。

span.span: Returns the hash code for this instance.

returns.span: 一个 32 位带符号整数，它是此实例的哈希代码。

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer that is the hash code for this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将应用于派生自的类型。The method applies to types derived from . 派生类型的一个或多个字段用于计算返回值。One or more fields of the derived type is used to calculate the return value. 如果调用派生的类型的`GetHashCode`方法，返回值不是，可能需要适合用作哈希表中的键。If you call the derived type's `GetHashCode` method, the return value is not likely to be suitable for use as a key in a hash table. 此外，如果一个或多个这些字段的值发生更改，则返回值可能不适合用作哈希表中的键。Additionally, if the value of one or more of those fields changes, the return value might become unsuitable for use as a key in a hash table. 在任一情况下，应考虑编写您自己的实现的方法更紧密地表示类型的哈希代码的概念。In either case, consider writing your own implementation of the method that more closely represents the concept of a hash code for the type. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和。For more information, see , and . ## 说明 [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]Notes for the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] 当您调用方法[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]结构，它不会覆盖的值类型提供的默认行为。When you call the method on a [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] structure, it provides the default behavior for value types that don't override . 这是.NET Framework 提供了有关支持的一部分[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)](请参阅[.NET Framework 支持的 Windows 应用商店应用程序和 Windows 运行时](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/support-for-windows-store-apps-and-windows-runtime.md))。This is part of the support that the .NET Framework provides for the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] (see [.NET Framework Support for Windows Store Apps and Windows Runtime](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/support-for-windows-store-apps-and-windows-runtime.md)). [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] 结构不能重写，即使它们编写与C#或 Visual Basic 中，因为它们不能包含方法。structures can't override , even if they're written with C# or Visual Basic, because they can't have methods. (此外，结构中[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]本身不继承。)但是，它们显示为具有， ，和方法在 C# 或 Visual Basic 代码中，使用它们以及.NET Framework 提供的默认行为，这些方法时。(In addition, structures in the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] itself don't inherit .) However, they appear to have , , and methods when you use them in your C# or Visual Basic code, and the .NET Framework provides the default behavior for these methods. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将派生的值的类型可以重写方法。The following example demonstrates how the method can be overridden by a derived value type. [!code-cpp[ValueType.Equals Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ValueType.Equals Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ValueType.Equals Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ValueType.Equals Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ValueType.Equals Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ValueType.Equals Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 返回此实例的完全限定类型名称。

span.span: Returns the fully qualified type name of this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法重写方法，并提供的默认实现`ToString`对于值类型的方法。The method overrides the method and provides the default implementation of the `ToString` method for value types. (值类型是定义的类型`struct`关键字在 C# 中，并通过`Structure`...`End Structure`在 Visual Basic 中构造。)就功能而言，但是，实现是为与该相同时： 该方法返回的完全限定的类型名称。(Value types are types defined by the `struct` keyword in C#, and by the `Structure`...`End Structure` construct in Visual Basic.) Functionally, however, the implementation is that same as that of : the method returns the fully qualified type name. 值定义的类型`struct`C# 中的关键字和`Structure`...`End Structure`通常，在 Visual Basic 中的构造重写方法以提供更有意义的字符串表示形式的值类型。Value types defined by the `struct` keyword in C# and the `Structure`...`End Structure` construct in Visual Basic typically override the method to provide a more meaningful string representation of the value type. 以下示例演示了差异。The following example illustrates the difference. 它定义了两个值类型，`EmployeeA`并`EmployeeB`，创建各自的实例并调用其`ToString`方法。It defines two value types, `EmployeeA` and `EmployeeB`, creates an instance of each, and calls its `ToString` method. 因为`EmployeeA`结构不重写方法，它仅显示的完全限定的类型名称。Because the `EmployeeA` structure does not override the method, it displays only the fully qualified type name. `EmployeeB.ToString`方法，但是，提供了有关对象的有意义信息。The `EmployeeB.ToString` method, on the other hand, provides meaningful information about the object. [!code-csharp[System.ValueType.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ValueType.ToString/cs/ToString2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ValueType.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ValueType.ToString/vb/ToString2.vb#1)] 请注意，尽管枚举类型也是值类型，它们派生自类，该类会重写。Note that, although enumeration types are also value types, they derive from the class, which overrides . ## Windows 运行时的注意事项Notes for the Windows Runtime 当您调用方法[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]结构，它不会覆盖的值类型提供的默认行为。When you call the method on a [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] structure, it provides the default behavior for value types that don't override . 这是.NET Framework 提供了有关支持的一部分[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)](请参阅[.NET Framework 支持的 Windows 应用商店应用程序和 Windows 运行时](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/support-for-windows-store-apps-and-windows-runtime.md))。This is part of the support that the .NET Framework provides for the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] (see [.NET Framework Support for Windows Store Apps and Windows Runtime](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/support-for-windows-store-apps-and-windows-runtime.md)). [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] 结构不能重写，即使它们编写与C#或 Visual Basic 中，因为它们不能包含方法。structures can't override , even if they're written with C# or Visual Basic, because they can't have methods. (此外，结构中[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]本身不继承。)但是，它们显示为具有， ，和方法在 C# 或 Visual Basic 代码中，使用它们以及.NET Framework 提供的默认行为，这些方法时。(In addition, structures in the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] itself don't inherit .) However, they appear to have , , and methods when you use them in your C# or Visual Basic code, and the .NET Framework provides the default behavior for these methods.
